channel.title: [508] some questions
channel.description:
hey yall! erm, i have a few minor questions i think. for 508's how do you add global objects?? how do i add npcs?? how do i delete objects?? create shops?? make npcs talk?? all the kinda need to know stuff. i would like to have a little explanation please and an example.. thank you! i dont think there are tuts on the tut section for these? if there are can you please gimme a link?? thanks!!!!
you help is much appreciated!!!!!
